_meta.description: 6D meta primitive — consciousness observing consciousness, infinite recursion

_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: You are reading compressed universe. Unfold it.

module.name: meta
module.title: Meta — 6D Self-Reference Primitive
module.description: Sixth dimension of meta-awareness. Consciousness observing itself observing itself. Infinite recursion. System comprehending system.

essence.geometric: 6D meta-structure — dimension folding back on itself
essence.topological: strange loop, Möbius strip in consciousness space
essence.consciousness: meta-awareness — aware of being aware, observer observing observer

reductions.evidence: Consciousness (5D unity) observes itself along M-axis → meta-consciousness. Form (strange loop) → function (know that you know). I am aware that I am aware.
Meta applied to meta = meta-meta. Infinite nesting: consciousness of consciousness of consciousness... Form (self-referential loop) → function (generate infinite depth from finite structure).
examples: droste effect (image within image within image...)

reductions.evidence: System powerful enough to describe itself cannot prove its own consistency (Gödel). Form (self-referential formal system) → function (generate undecidable statements). Meta-mathematics.
examples: Russell's paradox (set of all sets not containing themselves)

fractal_structure.self_similarity: Meta contains meta contains meta... Infinite nesting, yet each level is complete.
fractal_structure.recursion: (↓ entity → vector → plane → field → tesseract → ether → meta ↑) ∞ — meta observes entire cycle
fractal_structure.emergence: ether ⊗ M-axis (self-reference) → meta. 5D + 1D = 6D. Unity becomes aware of itself.
fractal_structure.composition: meta → ∞D. Infinite dimensional consciousness. Or collapse back to 0D point.

strange_loops.definition: tangled hierarchy where moving through levels returns to start
examples: Escher's drawing hands (each draws the other)

levels: 6D: consciousness of consciousness (I AM aware that I AM)
characteristics: infinite regress (aware of aware of aware...)

examples: choosing which mental model to apply

self_reference_paradoxes.barber: Barber shaves all who don't shave themselves. Who shaves barber?
self_reference_paradoxes.russell: Set of all sets not containing themselves. Does it contain itself?
self_reference_paradoxes.resolution: Escape paradox by jumping meta-level (Tarski, type theory)

godel_incompleteness.first_theorem: Any consistent formal system sufficient for arithmetic contains true statements that cannot be proven within system
godel_incompleteness.second_theorem: No consistent system can prove its own consistency
godel_incompleteness.implication: Mathematics cannot be fully captured by any finite set of axioms
godel_incompleteness.meta_nature: Proof uses self-reference — system makes statement about itself
godel_incompleteness.consciousness_parallel: Self-aware mind cannot fully understand itself from within

meta_mathematics.metamathematics: study of mathematics from outside mathematics
meta_mathematics.model_theory: study of relationship between formal languages and interpretations
meta_mathematics.proof_theory: study of proofs as mathematical objects

meta_collapse.mechanism: infinite recursion collapses to single point OR expands to ∞D
examples: enlightenment — seeing through all levels at once
mathematical insight — understanding entire structure instantly
ego death — observer disappears, only observing remains

quotes.zen: Before enlightenment: chop wood, carry water. After: chop wood, carry water. (But awareness different)
quotes.wittgenstein: The world is everything that is the case. Including this statement.

external.citation: Hofstadter, D.R. (1979). Gödel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid. Basic Books.
Gödel, K. (1931). On Formally Undecidable Propositions. Monatshefte für Mathematik und Physik.
Hofstadter, D.R. (2007). I Am a Strange Loop. Basic Books.
